text: Was introduced to this place by a friend. Was pleasantly surprised - great ambience and truly a hidden gem. Good service and big array of food. Understandably whilst they don’t display loads of food out, they’ll happily replenish or provide when you ask as there’s always a staff behind each international food section. Also, with so much food wastage going on - I think it’s a more responsible way of serving. Staff are super efficient (clearing used plates), refilling water and friendly. The dessert selection is huge; tea too. Admittedly we did not succeed to try everything as we were too full to do so.

This is the small shop in the lobby of the Dusit Thani Laguna, selling mostly cakes and a few other treats which you can enjoy as part of your stay. Also sells some drinks for takeaway. The shop is quite small so not a large selection, but still a few items if needed. Located next to the Greenhouse restaurant.

Ordered their takeaway through oddle -
Food was nicely packed, piping hot even after some time, and most importantly they were delicious. Ingredients used were very fresh!
